result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cody R. Ludwig

records.addlTxt: from Marinette Co. DA's office for copies. Mailed w/invoice on 10/24/2022.
Pre-trial conference on November 17, 2022 at 09:00 am.

2:02 PM Court calls 22CF118, 22CF187 Defendant Cody R. Ludwig NOT in court.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Cody R. Ludwig.  Attorney Lawrence Lasee in court for State of Wisconsin.   BWA.  Recall 2:03.  Appearances remain the same w/ the Deft. appearing.  BW cancelled.   22CF118 Motion to Suppress - State calls Deputy Baeten who is sworn and testifies.  Cross exam by Defense.  Argument.  Court finds reasonable for traffic stop.  Motion to suppress is denied.  2:13  22CF187 - Waiver of PHPQW received/reviewed by Court. Court finds waiver to be made freely and voluntarily. Court finds probable cause a felony has been committed by this defendant and is bound over to the circuit court. 2:14 Arraignment.  Defense waives reading and enters NOT GUILTY PLEA  Present bond cont'd.
Notice of Motion and Motion  to Suppress

9:24 AM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Cody R. Ludwig in court, in custody.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Cody R. Ludwig.
Motion hearing scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Motion hearing on September 19, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:03 PM Defendant Cody R. Ludwig in court, in custody.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Cody R. Ludwig. Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant received/reviewed Information and enters pleas of NO CONTEST to all counts. Defendant ordered to appear at the next hearing. Present bond cont'd.

2:00 PM Defendant Cody R. Ludwig in court, in custody.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Cody R. Ludwig. Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. PQW received/reviewed by the Court w/ the defendant. Court finds the defendant's waiver to be made freely and voluntarily and accepts waiver. Court finds probable cause a felony has been committed by this defendant and binds defendant over to the circuit court. 
Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.

1 PM Defendant Cody R. Ludwig appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Def given complaint, advised of charges, and advised of right to counsel.  SPD Brad Schraven present and will represent Deft. requests preliminary hearing.  Scheduled before Judge Conley as Judge Judge is out.   Bond is set.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
